articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: India Women rewrite history with 8-wicket win vs Australia Women in one-off Test - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India rewrited history as Harmanpreet and Co. thrashed Australia by 8 wickets to record 1st-ever Test win over the Baggy Greens in women Tests. | Cricket
articles.content: India Women sealed a eight-wicket win against Australia Women on Day 4 of their one-off Test match, in Mumbai on Sunday. Chasing 75 runs, India reached 75/2 in 18.4 overs, courtesy of an unbeaten kno… [+2296 chars]
